Xgody Gimbal N6 portable projector: Theater-quality streaming anywhere

If you don’t reside in a multiroom mansion, finding space for a massive flat-screen TV can prove challenging, to say the least. A 75-inch TV might be your dream, but it’s certainly not feasible if you’re limited when it comes to space or cash.

Think of it like this: With the Xgody Gimbal N6 projector, you basically have a home theater that travels with you anywhere. Just set it up and beam your favorite content onto a wall or projector screen. This might be your new favorite gadget.

Advanced features for easy streaming

Let’s dive into this portable projector’s specs:

  • 1080p full HD resolution: Ensures crisp, vibrant streaming of your movies, games or slideshows.
  • 300 ANSI lumens: Your movies and shows will look clear, even in a low-light setting.
  • Advanced LCD projection: Accurate color reproduction and consistent image quality mean more immersive streaming.
  • Autofocus and autokeystone correction: These automatic AI features allow the Gimbal N6 portable projector to adjust image sharpness and eliminate distortion, so your videos look perfect.
  • 180-degree rotating stand: Enjoy convenient positioning without additional hassle or equipment, whether you place the projector on a ceiling, wall or angled surface.
  • Customizable brightness modes: Choose how bright your videos appear (including an energy-saving mode).
  • Screen mirroring: Easily stream content from your iPhone, iPad, Android or Windows device.

The Xgody Gimbal N6, which runs on Android 13, stands out from other portable projectors due to its licensed Netflix support. What does this mean? You can securely stream without interruptions on this platform — just log in to rewatch Black Mirror. You can even operate this projector hands-free, thanks to its Google Assistant voice control feature.
